title: We need more ''Support/Assassin'' champions like pyke!
body:
------------------------------------------------We need more ''Support/Assassin'' champions like pyke!-----------------------------------------------------

1 .This way more players will start playing supp role.
2. Because i love playing {{champion:555}}pyke{{champion:555}} i want more assassin champs which can be played in supp role.
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

replies.body:
I think we need more unique champions with more complex and intriguing lores, while having uncommon and almost exclusive playstyles.

Like Bard, where roaming is integrated as an essential part of his kit, or Pyke as you mentioned who brings a lot of utility for his team via scouting wards, providing vision, and playing both roles as a support and/or assassin and even jungler. 

However, I once read that Bard was just an AOE Zhyonas on a recycled Blitzcrank skin...
there is already too much dmg in this game, we need to make enchanters and guardians more rewarding to play.
No we dont, and pyke was mistake
